name: Nova's Tricks or Treats
description:
This is a small rogue-like game for this Halloween.

Control Nova and help her collect candies while avoiding zombies.

How to play:
1, WASD or arrow keys to move. You can only move 1 tile at a time.

2, Move into tombs to teleport to the other side of the board.

3, Avoid zombies at all cost.

Have fun.
